page.title: 09A CHILD'S DAY
page.content: A typical day in my life starts with my Mum waking me up at 7.50 with a welcoming cup of tea and a kiss. I get up wash,dress and have breakfas t(toast and cereal). .At 8.30 I pack my bag and walk to{school}meeting friends on the way. I arrive at school at about 8.40 and play stringy which is a game where somebody is on and every time he/she tags someone they hold hands. 9 AM the whistle blows and after assembly we st art working until dinner time which is 12.00. I go home for lunch but most of my friends stay. At 1.15 the whistle blows and today it's topic day and I can work with my best friend Lorna.The day ends at 3.45. After tea I practise my piano and as it's Monday I go to{Swimming Club.}By 9.30 I am at home and after supper I go to bed.
